## FadingFeature.updateFadingFeature() function

Update the internals of the `FadingFeature` depending on the value of \[\[fadeNear\]\]. The fading feature will be disabled if fadeFar &lt;<!-- -->= 0.0.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
function updateFadingFeature(fadingMaterial: FadingFeature): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fadingMaterial | [FadingFeature](./harp-materials.fadingfeature.md) | FadingFeature |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
